meanings.definition: A resin obtained from tropical South American trees, used in varnishes and lacquers.
meanings.sent1: The copaiba was used to make the shiny varnish on the wooden table.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter applied copaiba to the furniture to give it a glossy finish.
